channel.title: Please Help
channel.description:
I was curious on how to make a item that you wear transform you into a npc example below
player1 wears blue phat player1 becomes old wise man player1 takes off hat player1 becomes normal
or even not be able to change bak unless they log out anything will help![br][size=1]Posted on: July 01, 2007, 07:30:44 PM[/size][hr]lol no 1 helping lol
